skin_care_scrubs.title: Detan Body Scrub
skin_care_scrubs.view_details: Full-body exfoliation to remove tan and dead skin
skin_care_scrubs.description: A refreshing body scrub designed to remove tan, dead skin cells, and impurities while restoring your skin's natural glow.

skin_care_scrubs.title: Coffee Body Scrub
skin_care_scrubs.view_details: Invigorating scrub for smoother, glowing skin
skin_care_scrubs.description: Infused with pure coffee grounds, this body scrub exfoliates deeply, improves circulation, and leaves skin silky smooth.

skin_care_scrubs.title: Sea Salt Glow Scrub
skin_care_scrubs.description: A sea salt-based exfoliating treatment to detoxify and polish the skin, making it visibly smoother and radiant.

skin_care_scrubs.title: Chocolate Body Scrub
skin_care_scrubs.view_details: Luxurious scrub for nourishing and glowing skin
skin_care_scrubs.description: Enriched with cocoa extracts, this scrub softens and hydrates your skin while offering a delightful spa-like experience.

skin_care_scrubs.title: Neem & Tulsi Herbal Scrub
skin_care_scrubs.description: A gentle herbal scrub made with neem and tulsi to cleanse, exfoliate, and fight bacteria on acne-prone or sensitive skin.

skin_care_scrubs.title: Gold Radiance Scrub
skin_care_scrubs.description: A premium scrub that uses real gold dust to exfoliate and impart a radiant glow, perfect for special occasions.
